UartSci_Driver_t Struct Reference
UART Driver » UART Driver Internal Data Structures

SCI Driver Master Control Block. More...

#include <drivers/uart/include/uartsci.h>

Data Fields

UartSci_DriverStatus status
 Status of the Driver Instance.
 
uint8_t * ptrWriteBuffer
 Pointer to the data buffer which is to be sent out by the UART Driver.
 
uint8_t shiftJustification
 This is the number of bits the data needs to be shifted. This is calculated using the data length.
 
int32_t writeCount
 Number of characters which have been sent out.
 
int32_t writeSize
 Number of characters which remain in the write buffer.
 
uint32_t writeCR
 Flag which indicates if a return character is to be written. This is used only while operating in the TEXT Mode.
 
SemaphoreP_Handle writeSem
 Handle to the Write semaphore.
 
uint8_t * ptrReadBuffer
 Pointer to the data buffer where the recevied data is placed.
 
int32_t readCount
 Number of characters which have been read.
 
int32_t readSize
 Number of characters which remain in the read buffer.
 
SemaphoreP_Handle readSem
 Handle to the Read semaphore.
 
HwiP_Handle hwiHandle
 Registered Interrupt Handler.
 
UART_Params params
 UART Parameters which were used to initialize the driver instance.
 
void * ptrDMAInfo
 Opaque Pointer to the DMA information if applicable.
 
UART_Stats stats
 Statistics associated with the driver instance:
 

Detailed Description

SCI Driver Master Control Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the UART Driver.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
